page.title: 03RED ROCKS NURSING HOME
page.content:
"This nursing home in Hoylake was originally a private house. It can accomodate 19 patients, some of whom are very ill and need constant attention. The Matron has been there since the home opened 34 years ago. All 45 nursing staff, working shifts, are State Registed Nurses. At weekends and holidays schoolgirls give their time to visit and help.
The patients have to pay high fees, but have a private room with nice views of Hilbre Island and the estuary. The meals are very good!
Well kept gardens surround the house in which residents can relax and enjoy the healthy sea air. Matron even cares for patients pets."
